title: Tragedy of life as seen in some housman's last poems
abstract: This thesis is a study of tragedy of life as seen in some Housman's Last Poems.Through Last Poems.Housman wants to show his idea about tragedy of life.Through this thesis, the writer wants to know why war causes tragedy of life and what tragedy of life in some Housman's Last Poems means.The thesis writer finds out that war causes of tragedy of life to the soldiers.War does not give adequate return to the soldiers'sacrifice.Their lives are not appreciated as the way they should be.It seems that their lives and sacrifice are meaningless since they have to die and get nothing. Besides,the thesis writer also finds out war causes the soldiers have to separate from the people that they love very much.Through Last Poems,the thesis writer also proves that suffering and death are tragedy of life.The soldiers have been through difficult time during the war.They have an opportunity to be killed or wounded.The wounded body shows the suffering of the speakers before they face their death. Death is the tragedy of life since their death is equated as the death of animals.It shows that their lives are unworthy.
subjects: ENGLISH POETRY-20TH CENTURY-STUDY AND TEACHING; HOUSMAN, ALFRED EDWARD, 1859-.... LAST POEMS-STUDY AND TEACHING
